string.value: The Legendary Tribal Ring: Circle of Ancient Thought
Happy to have found the remnant of the Miwok Artifacts, Kopee says she has something to tell me. Let's go and see her.
Kopee offered to make me a Legendary Tribal Ring using the belongings of her Miwok ancestors! I should collect every artifact I find and take my findings to Kopee.

Kopee, using the ancestors' belongings, made me a ring. I received a Circle of Ancient Thought from her! She told me she'd make me one every time I bring her an artifact. I'd better take what I find to Kopee.

Oh, my dearest friend #b#h0##k, I've been thinking about how I could repay you. And since you seem like an adventurous person, I'll make a unique gift just for you using my special ability. Aren't you curious what it might be?

I have the ability to make a ring using the artifacts that my ancestors have left behind. It's a marvelous ring I make which all the other adventurers will be jealous of! Only I, Kopee, know how to make that ring. But I can only make you the ring if you bring the required materials.
What do you say? Would you like me to make you a legendary #bCircle of Ancient Thought#k?

Alright! You'll be able to find the belongings of my ancestors in the Miwok Artifacts. I need the belongings of my ancestors to make a #bCircle of Ancient#k Thought. Bring me #b3 Bluejay Feathers#k, #b2 Red Bird Feathers#k, and #b1 Old Tree Branch#k.
As you may be aware already, the monsters have the #bMiwok Artifacts#k, and you must ask Miwok to retrieve the sealed treasure using the #bEnchanted Scroll#k. Hurry!
Oh, hm, it's truly a special ring. Are you sure you don't want it? Toh Relicseeker and I are planning to leave here sometime soon. Make sure you come back and see me if you change your mind later.
Ah! you've brought back all the materials I need! Alright, it's time for me to show you my special ability. Now, hand me what you've brought.

OOOOAAAAAH!!! Here, a #bCircle of Ancient Thoughts#k has been made just for you. What do you think? You like it? The effect of the ring differs depending on my condition at the time of making the ring. I hope you like it! If you bring me more materials, I can make you another one.
Too bad, but you haven't brought me everything I need to make the ring. I need #b3 Bluejay Feathers#k, #b2 Red Bird Feathers#k, #b1 Old Tree Branch#k in order to make the ring.
